name: .PISKEL File Extension
summary: Learn about .PISKEL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Graphic created by Piskel, a desktop and web application used to create pixel art and animated sprites; contains a graphic, which includes the model version, name, layers, frames per second, height, and width of the pixel art.

content: You can export PISKEL animations to the .GIF format. You can also export them to the .PNG format with all the frames side by side.
NOTE: Piskel allows you to create pixellated art that resembles the sprites that proliferated old school 2D games.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
